comments.value: This script is 545
comments.raw: --This script is 545

comments.value: SprayFleas (Mission 109) Pets have fleas. Player must spray 1 dog, 1 cat, 1 goat w/ spraygun.
comments.raw: --SprayFleas (Mission 109) Pets have fleas. Player must spray 1 dog, 1 cat, 1 goat w/ spraygun.

comments.value: DOG w/ fleas 3647 (terrier) (regular terrier 3264)
comments.raw: --DOG w/ fleas 3647 (terrier) (regular terrier 3264)

comments.value: CAT w/ fleas 3648 (regular cat 3265)
comments.raw: --CAT w/ fleas 3648 (regular cat 3265)

comments.value: GOAT w/ fleas 3649 (regular goat 3266)
comments.raw: --GOAT w/ fleas 3649 (regular goat 3266)

comments.value: FLEA EFFECT = BehaviorEffect ID 280
comments.raw: --FLEA EFFECT = BehaviorEffect ID 280

comments.value: WHEN STARTUP MESSAGE IS RECEIVED, CALL THE "SetFleas" FUNCTION, AND SET IT TO TRUE
comments.raw: --WHEN STARTUP MESSAGE IS RECEIVED, CALL THE "SetFleas" FUNCTION, AND SET IT TO TRUE

comments.value: Call the function that sets the state of the fleas, and set the function's boolean (bSetFleaBoolean) to true.
comments.raw: --Call the function that sets the state of the fleas, and set the function's boolean (bSetFleaBoolean) to true.

comments.value: A FUNCTION TO SET THE STATE OF FLEAS, TRUE OR FALSE.
comments.raw: --A FUNCTION TO SET THE STATE OF FLEAS, TRUE OR FALSE.

comments.value: Put the fleas back on the animal
comments.raw: --Put the fleas back on the animal

comments.value: self:AddSkill { skillID = 109 }
comments.raw: --self:AddSkill { skillID = 109 }

comments.value: self:ToggleActiveSkill { iSkillID = 109, bOn = true }        --BEHAVIOR_DESTINK
comments.raw: --self:ToggleActiveSkill { iSkillID = 109, bOn = true }        --BEHAVIOR_DESTINK

comments.value: self:RemoveSkill { skillID = 109 }
comments.raw: --self:RemoveSkill { skillID = 109 }

comments.value: self:ToggleActiveSkill{ iSkillID = 32, bOn = true }        --BEHAVIOR_DESTINK
comments.raw: --self:ToggleActiveSkill{ iSkillID = 32, bOn = true }        --BEHAVIOR_DESTINK

comments.value: When I'm squirted with the watergun
comments.raw: --When I'm squirted with the watergun

comments.value: If I don't have fleas (skillBehavior 109 = Stink Skill)
comments.raw: --If I don't have fleas (skillBehavior 109 = Stink Skill)

comments.value: if ( self:HasSkill { iSkillID = 109 }.bHas == false ) then
comments.raw: --if ( self:HasSkill { iSkillID = 109 }.bHas == false ) then

comments.value: Otherwise, I must have fleas, and squirting feels good
comments.raw: --Otherwise, I must have fleas, and squirting feels good

comments.value: Call the function that sets the state of the fleas, and set the function's boolean (bSetFleaBoolean) to false.
comments.raw: --Call the function that sets the state of the fleas, and set the function's boolean (bSetFleaBoolean) to false.

comments.value: create a local variable called "player" and assign it to the shooterID from the onSquirtWithWatergun message
comments.raw: --create a local variable called "player" and assign it to the shooterID from the onSquirtWithWatergun message

comments.value: update the mission task for mission 109 A value of 1 is sent to script owner, which increments the mission task by 1.
comments.raw: -- update the mission task for mission 109 A value of 1 is sent to script owner, which increments the mission task by 1.

comments.value: Start timer for fleas to return
comments.raw: --Start timer for fleas to return

comments.value: Timer named Timer_ResetFleas is attached the script's "self" (the pet)
comments.raw: -- Timer named Timer_ResetFleas is attached the script's "self" (the pet)

comments.value: Call the function that sets the state of the fleas, and set the function's boolean (bSetFleaBoolean) to true.
comments.raw: --Call the function that sets the state of the fleas, and set the function's boolean (bSetFleaBoolean) to true.
